text: Pedro Vega Zambrano (born June 29, 1958) is a Mexican football manager and former player. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1958 births Category:Living people Category:Footballers from Mexico City Category:Mexican footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:Club América footballers Category:Toros Neza footballers Category:Mexican football managers
title: Pedro Vega (footballer, born 1958)
